resources.string: This app was created by Pratikshit. I will be making more apps soon, this is just for a bit of fun. This was version 0.95 (stable) and an update will be released before you fall in love with this app
There are 10 questions and there\'s only one correct answer (one word) for each one of them. If your answer is correct, no need to press any button, app will automatically verify your answer.
You have 30 seconds to answer each riddle, if you fail to write the correct response, answer will be revealed and your score will be reduced by one.
You get 1 point for a correct answer, and -1 for pressing skip button.
You have 3 hints at your disposal, activate a hint by pressing the bulb icon on the top right corner
Do you want to leave the game?
